text: Today, the West Coast is experiencing poor conditions with 5 ft @6s NNW swell and fresh 23 mph N winds, making it blown out across the board. Tomorrow looks a bit better with 4 ft @6s WNW swell and lighter 14 mph W winds; sheltered spots like Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay could offer some fun. The day after, conditions drop slightly to 4 ft @7s NW with fresh 25 mph NNW winds, keeping it messy. Best: tomorrow.
